title: About
content: Fermento is a magazine manifesto which reflects on the Liquid Society we live in. It is a curated collection of case studies that embody our ideology in a low-budget printed magazine. Fermento has eight issues. The first one is Antifragile, i.e. the skill to gain substance from disorder and chaos. This concept sees its natural metaphor in succulent plants.

Each issue of the magazine has a unique sticker which carries unpublished material, viewable in the Augmented Reality app. The stickers are meant to be shared around the city: the contents can be accessed by everyone and visualized on an online map.
This is what we mean when we say “Fermento starts from you”.

title: Team
content: Paula Ahn, Elena Filippi, Edoardo Guido, Sara Lavazza, Francesco Scagliarini, Ruggero Accardo.
